# Copilot Instructions for E-QMS

## About This Repository

E-QMS is a Quality Management System designed to help organizations manage quality processes, documentation, and compliance requirements.

## Project Context

This repository contains the source code for E-QMS (Electronic Quality Management System). The system is designed to streamline quality management processes in organizations.

## Development Guidelines

### Code Style and Standards

- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Follow industry best practices for the specific technologies used
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic or business rules
- Keep functions focused and single-purpose

### Documentation

- Update README.md when adding new features or changing setup instructions
- Document API endpoints, configuration options, and deployment procedures
- Keep inline code comments up-to-date with code changes

### Testing

- Write tests for new features and bug fixes
- Ensure all tests pass before committing
- Aim for good test coverage of critical paths

### Version Control

- Write clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep commits focused on a single logical change
- Reference issue numbers in commit messages when applicable

### Quality Management Domain

When working on this project, consider:
- Compliance and audit trail requirements
- Document version control and change management
- User permissions and access control
- Data integrity and validation
- Regulatory requirements that may apply to quality management systems

## Getting Started

Please refer to the README.md file for setup and installation instructions.

## Questions?

If you need clarification on any aspect of the codebase or development process, please refer to existing code patterns or reach out to the repository maintainers.
